metadata.Name: PIQA
metadata.Description: PIQA is a dataset for evaluating physical commonsense reasoning in natural language. It consists of questions that require understanding of how the physical world works.
metadata.Paper Title: PIQA: Reasoning about Physical Commonsense in Natural Language
metadata.Abstract: Commonsense reasoning is a crucial capability for general intelligence, yet it remains a significant challenge for current AI systems. A key aspect of commonsense is understanding the physical world—how objects behave, how forces interact, and how events unfold. We introduce PIQA (Physical Interaction: Question Answering), a dataset designed to probe physical commonsense reasoning in natural language. PIQA consists of questions that require selecting the more plausible continuation of a scenario involving physical interactions. We demonstrate that state-of-the-art language models struggle on PIQA, highlighting the need for improved reasoning capabilities. We also analyze the types of physical knowledge required to succeed on PIQA, providing insights into the challenges of building AI systems with commonsense understanding.
